mapper.select: select from sys_permission where type=#{type} order by type, permission_id

select distinct a.permission_id from sys_permission a, sys_role_permission_map b, sys_user_role_map c where a.type='service' and a.permission_id=b.permission_id and b.role_id=c.role_id and c.user_id=#{userId}

select distinct a.permission_id from sys_permission a, sys_role_permission_map b, sys_user_role_map c where a.type='page' and a.permission_id=b.permission_id and b.role_id=c.role_id and c.user_id=#{userId}
